table.name: Announcements
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Announcements (Announcement_Num Integer PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE NOT NULL, Title Text NOT NULL, Dept_ID Text NOT NULL, Upload_Date DATE NOT NULL)

row.value: Policy on attendance for lectures and events

table.name: Client_Departments
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Client_Departments (User_ID INTEGER, Dept_ID Integer PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE NOT NULL, Dept_Name Text, Dept_Head Text)

table.name: Courses
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Courses (User_ID INTEGER, Course_ID Integer PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE NOT NULL, Dept_ID Integer NOT NULL, Course_Name Text NOT NULL, Dean_Name Text NOT NULL)

table.name: Department
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Department (Dept_ID Integer PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL UNIQUE, Dept_Name Text, Dept_Extension Integer, Dept_Description Text)

row.value: The sales excutive who bring customers
The technicians working for enhancing the portal
The people who load the data in the database
The department for marketing over digital media
The depatment which handles accounts and invoices

table.name: Employees
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Employees (Emp_ID Integer PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE, Office_ID Integer REFERENCES Office (Office_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, Dept_ID Integer REFERENCES Department (Dept_ID), First_Name TEXT, Last_Name TEXT, Contact_Details Varchar (40), Salary Varchar (40), Login TEXT UNIQUE, Password TEXT, Account_Number TEXT UNIQUE, Bank_Name TEXT)

constraint.definition: REFERENCES Office (Office_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION

table.name: Feedback
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Feedback (FB_Num Integer PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE NOT NULL DEFAULT AUTOINCREMET, Student_ID Integer NOT NULL, Teacher_ID Integer NOT NULL, Punctuality Integer NOT NULL, Effectiveness Integer NOT NULL, Accessibility Integer NOT NULL, Exposure Integer NOT NULL)

table.name: Invoices
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Invoices (Invoice_ID Integer PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE NOT NULL, User_ID Integer NOT NULL, Subscription_ID Integer REFERENCES Subscription (Subscription_ID) NOT NULL, Emp_ID INTEGER REFERENCES Employees (Emp_ID), Payment_Method TEXT, Due_Date_Invoices DATE)

table.name: Office
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Office (Office_ID Integer PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE, Office_Address Text, Office_Contact_Details Varchar (40), Office_Type Text, Company_Reg_Num Integer)

row.value: MAY FLOWER FL. 2101, HIRANANDANI MEADOWS, THANE Thane MH 400607 IN
MAY FLOWER FL. 2101, GREEN MEADOWS, VASHI Navi Mumbai MH 400703 IN

table.name: Professor
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Professor (User_ID INTEGER, Professor_ID, Dept_ID Integer NOT NULL, Name Text NOT NULL, Contact_Details Text NOT NULL, Address Text NOT NULL, Designation TEXT NOT NULL)

table.name: Students
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Students (User_ID INTEGER, Roll_Number Integer PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE NOT NULL, Name Text, Addres Text, Contact_Details Text, Course_ID Integer, Xth_Board Text, Xth_Score Float, XIIth_Board Text, XIIth_Score Float, Graduation_University Text, Graduation_Score Float, Trim_1_CGPA Float, SIP_Company Text, Exe_Company Text)

table.name: Subjects
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Subjects (User_ID INTEGER, Sub_ID Integer PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE NOT NULL, Professor_ID Integer NOT NULL, Course_ID Integer NOT NULL, Sub_Name Text NOT NULL)

table.name: Subscription
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Subscription (Subscription_ID Integer PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE, Subscription_Name Text, Price Text, Validity Text)

table.name: Users
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Users (User_ID Integer PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE NOT NULL, Emp_ID Integer REFERENCES Employees (Emp_ID) NOT NULL, Subscription_ID Integer REFERENCES Subscription (Subscription_ID) NOT NULL, User_Name Text NOT NULL, User_Email_ID Text UNIQUE NOT NULL, User_Mobile_Number Text UNIQUE NOT NULL, Login TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL, Password TEXT NOT NULL, Full_Institute_Name TEXT NOT NULL, Address TEXT NOT NULL)
